modName: Quick Start - Skip The Opening Sequence
summary:
It will let you start a new game any time you want, skipping all the opening sequences, like
the carriage ride and the first dungeon, which will save you a lot of time, if you like to
start new character often.
descriptionHtml:
It will let you start a new game any time you want, skipping all the opening sequences, like
the carriage ride and the first dungeon, which will save you a lot of time, if you like to
start new character often.

INSTALLATION
Put included .esp file into your \'Data\' folder

CHANGELOG
1.1: added alternate file, that will not trigger main quest. Files are no longer in .txt format.
2.0: the mod is now a simple .esp file

I was inspired by Ghostdancer\'s mod \"Alternative Character Generation\"
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3281
author: TSuser
